title: A Very Hard Work Week
description: Laney is a successful CEO that is both smart and driven. But, behind her success lies a dirty little secret. Laney loves to be naughty and chooses to get down and dirty whenever she feels like it. Join Laney over the course of her work week and experience the pleasures of her many escapades. This book contains explicit sexual situations and language- Enjoy!  * Estimated reading time: 40 minutes
author: Victoria Rain
